---
title: "亲子丼"
---

## 材料 - Ingredients

- 洋葱 Onion
- 青葱 Spring Onion
- 鸡腿肉 Chicken Thigh
- 鸡蛋 Egg
- 白饭 Cooked Rice
- <可选> 海苔丝 Shredded Dried Seaweed

## 调味料 - Seasonings

- 味淋 Mirin
- 酱油 Soy Sauce
- 日式高汤 Japanese Style Dashi Stock
- <与高汤二选一> 鲣鱼酱油 Bonito Soy Sauce
